Definitions.Paraphrase:
something that one says or writes, often officially 
说话，叙述，声明
The Prime Minister will make a statement tomorrow on the new educational plans.
首相明天将就新的教育计划发表一项声明。

done quickly and suddenly, often without careful thought
迅速的，突然的
a snap decision
仓猝的决定
a snap judgment 
快速判断

1. an opinion 
看法，意见
What, in your judgment, is the best course of action?
依你看，什么是最佳的行动方针？
2. the ability to form common sense opinions or to make wise decisions 
判断力，识别力
He always shows excellent judgment in his choice of staff.
他他在选择员工方面总显示出非凡的判断力。

in a way it appears;  as if
从表面上看起来；似乎是
a seemingly endless list of complaints
一连串似乎是没完没了的抱怨

immediate; happening suddenly or at once 
立即的，即刻的，瞬间发生的
instant change 
瞬间发生的变化
The film was an instant success. 
这部电影一上映就获得了成功。

something one does
行为
They should be judged by their actions, not by what they say.
 应该根据他们的行动，而不是根据他们所说的话来对他们进行判断。

accept or believe that something is true even though you have no evidence 
假定，想当然认为，臆断
Most people assume actions speak louder than words.
大多数人认为行动胜过言辞。

make someone or oneself familiar with or aware of
使认识，使了解
Please acquaint me with the facts of the case.
请给我介绍一下案件的实际情况。
Are you acquainted with each other?  
你们互相认识吗？

the way one acts or behaves 
行为，举止
Her behaviour has been very strange lately.
她最近的行为举止非常怪异。

concerning the behavior of an animal or person, or  the study of their behavior
（关于）行为的；行为科学的
behavioral science  
行为科学
behavioral patterns  
行为模式

figure out; judge
估计，判断
He estimated that the journey would take two hours.
他估计旅程需要两个小时。

think something is bigger or more important, etc. than it really is 
过高估计，过高评价
We overestimated how much food we would need - there was a lot left over. 
我们过多估计了我们所需要的食品了，还剩下许多呢。

easily seen or understood; clear 
显然的，明显的
His joy was obvious to everyone. 
每个人都看出他很高兴。
It was obvious that he was wrong.
很明显，他错了。

not complete  
部分的，不完全的
The meeting was only a partial success. 
会议仅仅是局部的成功。

partly; not completely 
部分地，不完全地
The story was partially true. 
故事不完全真实。

(for) explain or give a reason for
作出解释，提出理由，说明
His illness accounted for his not being here yesterday.
他的病是他昨天缺席的原因。

1. a report or description of something that has happened 
记述，描述，报告
She gave the police a full account of the accident. 
她向警察详细描述了事故的情况。
2. the plan by which a bank looks after your money for you 
账户，交易关系
to open /close an account  
在一家银行开立／结清一个账户

move one thing against another 
擦，摩擦
He rubbed his eyes. 
他擦了擦自己的双眼。

1. using or showing force or stress in order to succeed 
活跃有为的，积极进取的
an aggressive policeman 
 一个工作积极的警察
2. ready or likely to fight or argue  
挑衅的，侵略的
Some people get aggressive after drinking spirits.
有些人酒后爱寻衅惹事。

not active; not showing any feelings or action
被动的，消极的
Television encourages people to be passive.
电视使人们变得不爱活动。

feel angry about something because it is unfair
（尤指因感到委屈、伤害等）对......表示忿恨，对......怀恨，怨恨
She bitterly resented being treated differently from the men.
她因受到与男子不同的待遇而愤然。

feeling annoyed 
充满忿恨的，怨恨不止的
He felt very resentful at being unfairly treated. 
他对自己受到不公正待遇而感到忿忿不平。

the purpose or special duty of a person or thing 
功能，作用，机能
The function of the heart is to send blood through the body. 
心脏的功能是给全身供血。
Each object has a single function.
每件东西自有其独特的用处。

1. concerning the position of people in society 
一定社会地位的
social status  
社会地位
We share the same social roots.  
我们有共同的社会背景。
2. concerning how  people or groups of people connect; about the order of society
 社会的
social change 
社会变化  
social problems
社会问题

your social or work position when compared to other people 
地位，身份
Teachers have a very high status in our country.
教师在我国享有很高的地位。

(often pl.) a strong desire to have or do something 
(常用复数 ) 强烈的愿望，志向
She has aspirations to become a scientist. 
她有志于成为一个科学家。

1. show or present (oneself or one's qualities) in a certain way 
表明......特征，使呈现特性
He tried to project himself as kind and thoughtful. 
他试图使自己表现得善良而有头脑。
2. plan  
打算，计划
The company has been projecting a 5% increase for its members.
公司计划给职工增加5%的收入。

1. a plan or secret plan 
计划，规划
a major project to reduce pollution in our river 
减少我们这条河污染的重大计划
2. a piece of study or research 
（学术交流的）课题，作业，科研项目
I'm doing a project on Chinese history. 
我正在做一个有关中国历史的研究课题。

1. raise someone to a higher level or position  
提升，晋升
He's been promoted from assistant manager to manager. 
他已从助理提升到了经理。
2. encourage; help the progress of something 
促进，增进
The meetings of the officials have promoted good exchanges between the two countries. 
两国官员的会晤增进了两国间的有益交流。

decoration
装饰品，点缀品

奖牌，奖章，勋章
He was given a medal for bravery. 
他因勇敢而被授予奖章。
He won a gold medal in the game. 
他在比赛中赢得一枚金牌。
宝石，宝石饰物，首饰

a very strong opinion or belief  
坚定的信仰；确信
religious convictions
宗教，信念

a plan to do a number of things in order to achieve a special aim 
运动
a political campaign  
政治宣传运动
an campaign against smoking  
反对吸烟运动

1. an idea about faith, political ideas, etc.
信念，信仰
Working on Sunday is against their religious beliefs.
星期天工作与他们的宗教信仰是格格不入的。
2. a feeling that someone or something is true, good or right, or that someone or something really exists
相信，信任
It's my belief that she will win. 
我看她会赢。

1. connected with religion  
宗教的，宗教上的
religious faith 
宗教信仰
2. having a strong belief in a religion 
笃信宗教的，虔诚的
She's not very religious.
她对宗教并不很虔诚。

something that stands for or is a sign of something else 
标志，象征
Wear this ring as a token of our friendship.
戴上这个戒指，作为我们友谊的象征。

the state of being a member  
会员身份，会员资格
To sign up for membership, please fill in the form. 
要申请会员的话，请填表。

徽章，证章；标记，标识
The team members have jackets with the club badge on them. 
运动员都穿着带有他们俱乐部标识的茄克衫。

something that is done successfully, esp. through hard work or skill
成就，成绩
She felt the book was her greatest achievement.
她感到这本书是她的最大成就。

connected with the supply of money, trade, industry, etc.
经济的，经济上的
The country faces growing economic problems.
这个国家面临愈来愈多的经济问题。

the style or kind of building  
建筑式样，建筑风格
Some of the buildings here are built using a foreign style of architecture.
这儿有些大楼是按外国建筑风格建造的。

strict
严格死板的，苛严的
Some students complained about the rigid rules and regulations at the school. 
一些学生抱怨学校苛刻的规章制度。

what people normally do or follow  
准则
It has become the norm for wives to work.
妻子参加工作已经成为一种准则。

the way that something is done, built, etc. 
样式，风格
The Japanese developed an American-based style of education.
日本人形成了一种美国式的教育风格。

the way one lives
生活方式
Getting married often means a sudden change in life-style.
结婚常意味着生活方式的一种突然变化。

Definitions.PartofSpeech:
not having enough of 
缺乏，不足
They were prevented from going on holiday by their lack of money.
他们由于缺钱而不能去度假。

discover 
找出，查明，发现
I need to find out exactly what went wrong. 
我需要查明到底出了什么毛病。

one is judged by what he does, rather than what he says he will do 
行动比言语更响亮；事实胜于雄辩
He said her actions speak louder than her words; she's never kept a promise. 
他说她的行动胜于言辞，可她从不守诺。

concerning someone or something  
有关，关于
his comments in relation to this affair 
他的一席有关这件事的意见

become /be familiar or friendly with
与... 相识，了解
I'm not acquainted with her father.
我不认识她父亲。

1. learn interesting or useful information  
获得
You can pick up some really useful messages from his gestures. 
你从他的手势中能够得到一些真正有用的信息。
2. learn a new skill or language by practicing it rather than being taught it 
学会
I picked up quite a lot of Japanese words during my six-month stay in Japan.
我在日本六个月的逗留中学会了许多日语单词。

to some degree; not completely  
在某种程度上；部分
The delay was in part due to the heavy rain. 
在某种程度上讲，延误是由大雨造成的。

explain or give a reason for  
作出解释，提出理由，说明
Bad weather accounted for the crop's failing. 
恶劣气候是庄稼欠收的原因。

be /feel comfortable 
感到无拘束，感到熟悉
They were friendly and kind and I felt at home immediately. 
他们很友好和气，我立即就感到无拘无束了。

be satisfied or happy with 
对......感到满足
He doesn't want more money — he's content with what he has. 
他不需要更多的钱——他对自己所拥有的已感到心满意足了。

a great quantity of 
大量的，丰富的
a wealth of information  
大量的信息
PBK联谊会（美国大学优秀生和毕业生的荣誉组织，成立于1776年），PBK联谊会会员

Definitions.Paraphrase:
connected with the time of Queen Victoria (1837-1901) 
（英国）维多利亚（女王）的，维多利亚时代的，维多利亚式的
